data.text: Enti saa mmarima baasa yi ammua Hiob bio, ɛfiri sɛ, na ɔtene wɔ ɔno ara ani so.
Na Busini Barakel babarima Elihu a ɔfiri Ram abusua mu no bo fuu Hiob yie sɛ ɔbu ne ho bem na ɔmmu Onyankopɔn mmom bem.
Ne bo fuu nnamfonom baasa no sɛ wɔantumi anya nnyinasoɔ bi ammɔ Hiob nsɛm no angu, nanso wɔbuu no fɔ.
Elihu twɛnee sɛ afoforɔ no bɛkasa akyerɛ Hiob, ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔanyinyini sene no.
Na ɔhunuu sɛ nnipa baasa no nni asɛm biara ka bio no, nʼabufuo sɔreeɛ.
Enti Busini Barakel babarima Elihu kaa sɛ,
Medwenee sɛ, ‘Ɛsɛ sɛ mpanimfoɔ kasa;
Nanso honhom a ɛte onipa mu,
Ɛnyɛ mpanimfoɔ nko na wɔyɛ anyansafoɔ,
“Enti mese: Montie me;
Metwɛneeɛ wɔ ɛberɛ a morekasa,
meyɛɛ aso maa mo pa ara,
Monnka sɛ, ‘Ɔnim nyansa;
Sɛ Hiob ne me kasaeɛ a,
“Mo ho adwiri mo, monni hwee ka bio;
Ɛsɛ sɛ metwɛn wɔ ɛberɛ a moayɛ komm yi,
Me nso mɛka bi
Ɛfiri sɛ, nsɛm ahyɛ mʼanomu ma,
Me mu no, mete sɛ nsa a ɛhyɛ toa mu;
Ɛsɛ sɛ mekasa na me ho tɔ me;
Merenyɛ animhwɛ
Na sɛ makwadare akorɔkorɔ mu a,
